title: ArtyTorrent Pack 97-ReFX Nexus-Bass Expansion-AMPLiFY
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 97-ReFX Nexus-Bass Expansion-AMPLiFY
-----------------------------------------------------

This is a superb addition to the ReFX Nexus synth. 128 electro bass sounds designed by DejaVu (Kevin Schroeder).

You must have a working version of Nexus 1.3.9 in order for this pack to work. I uploaded the Windows installation update in my previous torrent.

To install this 605MB ROM pack...
open Nexus in your sequencer.
click on the SYS tab (on the right of the virtual LCD).
import exp.
Browse to the nxp.
Once the ROMs have been copied to your usual Nexus directory, find the new presets with the LIBRARY tab.

Thanks to AMPLifY for initial rip, and vstclub.com for distribution.

More expansions will be uploaded in due course. Please seed for the benefit of all.

--
Arty - "Free bass"
29th February 2008
